title: Where is the best place to incorporate a tech startup outside the US? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hong Kong is nice.  It's not the best place in the world if you want a tax haven, but you do have a startup/tech community that you can tap into. This can be useful if you need a recommendation for a lawyer/accountant/bank or if you want someone to check that business X isn't a scam.  If your business involves buying widgets from southern China, then before you wire the money, it's easy to get someone you trust to visit the address and see that there is in fact a widget factory there.
